alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 4:16PM MDT until August 12 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL KANE AND EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES...SPECIFICALLY FOR EASTERN PORTIONS OF ZION NATIONAL PARK... At 416 PM MDT, Flash flooding in Clear Creek and adjoining washes has occurred from earlier thunderstorms. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Zion National Park Dispatch reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and slot canyons. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Zion National Park...specifically Clear Creek and its adjoining normally dry washes on the eastern side of the park. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Hikers in the area need to move to and remain on higher ground outside of washes and slot canyons.
